info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 7:44AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Catawba, southeastern Rutherford, northwestern Lincoln, western Cleveland and southeastern Burke Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 744 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Hickory to 6 miles southeast of Forest City. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hickory, Longview, Boiling Springs NC, Icard, Hildebran, Belwood, Lawndale, Polkville, Ellenboro and Lattimore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
